name: Active
description: This object is active and currently in use.

name: Inactive
description: This object is inactive but still exists in the system.

name: Deleted
description: This object has been deleted and is no longer considered active.

name: Draft
description: This subscription plan is in draft status and not yet available for customers.

name: Active
description: This subscription plan is active and available for customers to subscribe.

name: Inactive
description: This subscription plan is inactive and not available for new customers, but existing subscribers are still using it.

name: Archived
description: This subscription plan is archived and no longer available for any customers.
note: Plan has been completely phased out.

name: Pending Approval
description: This subscription plan is pending approval before it can be activated.
note: Awaiting review from the admin team.

name: Active
description: The subscription is currently active and the customer is receiving the service or product.

name: Pending
description: The subscription has been created but is not yet active.

name: Trialing
description: The customer is in a trial period and the subscription is active but may have limitations.

name: Suspended
description: The subscription is temporarily inactive, usually due to non-payment or other issues.
remark: Access to the service is temporarily revoked.

name: Cancelled
description: The subscription has been cancelled and is no longer active.
remark: The customer will no longer receive the service.

name: Expired
description: The subscription term has ended and the customer has not renewed it.
remark: The subscription is no longer active and access has been revoked.

name: Overdue
description: The subscription is active but the customer has missed one or more payments.
remark: The customer is at risk of suspension or cancellation.

name: Grace Period
description: The subscription is technically expired but the customer is still allowed access during a grace period.
remark: The customer has a short window to make a payment before the subscription is fully cancelled.

name: Inactive
description: The subscription is not active and the customer is not receiving any services.
remark: The subscription is not currently in use.

name: Pending Cancellation
description: The customer has requested cancellation, but the subscription is still active until the end of the billing period.
remark: The subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current billing cycle.

name: Pending Renewal
description: The subscription is nearing the end of its term and a renewal is pending.
remark: The renewal is automatic unless the customer opts out.

name: Trial Ended
description: The trial period has ended and the subscription needs to be activated or converted to a paid plan.
remark: The customer needs to make a payment or choose a plan to continue service.

name: Archived
description: The subscription has been permanently deactivated and archived.
remark: No further actions can be taken on this subscription.

name: Pending
description: This invoice is pending and payment has not yet been made.

name: Paid
description: This invoice has been paid.

name: Failed
description: This invoice has failed payment and is not completed.

name: Pending
description: This payment is pending and has not been processed yet.

name: Waiting for Verification
description: This payment is waiting for verification before being processed.

name: Verified
description: This payment has been verified and processed successfully.

name: Online
description: This payment method is an online payment method.

name: Bank Transfer
description: This payment method involves a bank transfer.
